attributes.action: LET THE PEOPLE TELL YOU where we want renegotiation of the terms of our involvement in the EU.
attributes.additional_details: The recent elections have revealed a huge chasm between what the people want to talk about and what political parties think we want them to talk about regarding our involvement in the EU.  Politicians CANNOT be trusted to represent the views of the electorate (that stopped when Tony Bliar sat down on the sofa in number 10) because of their arrogance so the people MUST be given the right to lay down to them the terms of reference over renegotiations of our continued membership.  Politicians who believed they knew what was best for us have been told, unequivocally, THEY DO NOT!
